entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
